header.imgInputLabel: I allow my image to be shown to other students & staff

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.popup: Personal Information is helpful for us to know our students better and provide specific services, e.g. study places for female students

location.title: Location
location.popup: Some of our services are only available in certain areas. Knowing your location allows us to send you the right infos.
location.infoMsg: We will not refer any sensitive information to a third party; however, in order to offer tailor-made workshops or events close to you, we need your location details.

contactDetails.title: Contact information
contactDetails.popup: We will need your private email if you have to reset your kiron email account. We will contact you via phone for additional services.
contactDetails.infoMsg: Kiron does not share your contact details with anybody without your permission.
contactDetails.whatsappCheck: Kiron can contact me via WhatsApp Messenger on this number
contactDetails.whatsappCheckPositive: Kiron <1>can</1> contact me via WhatsApp Messenger on this number
contactDetails.whatsappCheckNegative: Kiron <1>cannot</1> contact me via WhatsApp Messenger on this number
contactDetails.emailMsg: Have a new <1>private</1> email address? You can change it here. We will send you a confirmation email to this address - <2>please confirm</2> it within the next days.

certificate.title: Certificate of Enrollment
certificate.desc: Do you need to prove that you are a student with Kiron?
certificate.downloadLink: to upload a status document in order to download certificate of enrollment.

COEContainer.question: What are you planning to use your certificate for in the next six months?
COEContainer.info: To download the certificate of enrollment, please select one or several uses of the certificate of enrollment above.
